page.title: 08OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called Tetney County Primary School.It is housed in quite new buildings which are very nice to work in.The first part was opened in 1968,the second part in 1981.In between,the school was on 2 sites,either end of the village.The old school is now an old peoples home. We have a nice playing field where we can play our games.We also have 3 ducks and 3 chickens which we look after. We have 2 libraries in school,fiction and non-fiction.They are well stocked because the P.T.A.has raised a lot of money. There are 5 classrooms,hall,small hall,disused kitchen and a mobile classroom. At lunchtime we eat sandwiches in our classrooms because we don't have school dinners.
